summary:
- **Drilling Update**:  
  - Maiden drilling campaign at Zopkhito Sb-Au Project (7,000–10,000m diamond drilling) to commence in July 2025.  
  - Geophysical surveys planned to extend current foreign resource estimate (225Kt @ 11.6% Sb, 7.1Mt @ 3.7g/t Au).  

- **Resource Development**:  
  - Focus on converting foreign resource estimate to JORC-compliant resource and conducting a preliminary economic assessment.  

- **Capital Structure**:  
  - 775,134,025 fully paid shares.  
  - 80,000,000 performance rights.  
  - 20,000,000 options.  

*No material trading or capital markets action identified (operational update only).*
